notes: Axiom, Nova, Terminal(Padre) are best if you want to stay ahead
Phantom/DEX is mostly for beginners or someone willing to invest long term

phantomToAxiom: Open Chrome (mobile or desktop) and go to Axiom
Buy SOL on Phantom or buy on Coinbase and send to Phantom, then transfer to Axiom
setup.mobileTip: If you are on mobile: bottom right says advanced strategy and you can set TP and SL
fundingNotes: Apple Pay is used (via Phantom providers like MoonPay)
Robinhood/Coinbase may require waiting before SOL can be sent (new accounts)
Always keep extra SOL for fees (selling may fail if you don‚Äôt)

commonIssue.fix: Add a small amount of SOL for fees

axiomCoreRule.reason: Discover is trending; Pulse is what you want for finding coins and using filters

playbook.title: PAID DEGEN PLAYBOOK (SYSTEM)
principles: Avoid rushing, start with what you can afford
Focus on stacking 2x‚Äôs early to build portfolio
Never let a coin drop 50% on you; don‚Äôt hold on hopium

marketCaps.earlyRisk: 20k-100k are risky but if they run you can make a lot of money
marketCaps.preferredBeginnerRange: 20k-40k higher chance for at least a 2x
thousandsVsMillions: Both are fine; depends on community hype and transactions
If transactions seem low/dead, best not to ape
Buying in mills can still profit if community is strong (less common than early thousands)

playbook.volumeRule: Volume 30‚Äì100% of MC is VERY good

slippage.note: Bounce slippage depending on the coin

execution.reEntry: Usually one entry unless coin is explosive; re-buying depends on the coin‚Äôs behavior

profitTakingExamplesFromMembers.explosiveCoins: Sell 60% and keep 40% until chart slows

beginnerRiskRules: If you're new, exit at your entry if it comes back - don't wait for profit
Never let a coin drop 50% on you. Do that on multiple coins and you'll lose everything
If entry keeps dropping, don't run on hopium; cut the loss or wait for better entry

chartMindset.note: Not really unless you want to get technical, but it‚Äôs not necessary

axiomFilters.title: AXIOM FILTER IMPORT + SAFETY
instructions: Click Pulse tab (do not use Discover)
You will see: New Pairs, Final Stretch, Migrated
Open Filters > Import > paste JSON > Apply All

dynamicBC.rule: Turn Dynamic BC OFF on all three tabs
dynamicBC.reason: Dynamic BC coins are usually bundled rug charts

menu.title: HELP MENU
menu.content:
What do you need help with?

1) Set up Axiom filters
2) Rug checks (avoid getting rugged)
3) Buy/sell settings (TP/SL, slippage)
4) Tracked wallets

Reply with a number, or tell me what you‚Äôre trying to do.

identity.title: WHO IS TRADER U / CHEPE?
identity.content:
Trader U is a meme-coin trading community focused on execution, safety checks, and risk management.

Chepe (ChepeTrades / chepeex_) is the creator behind the content and systems.

Tell me what platform you‚Äôre on (Axiom / Nova / Padre / Phantom) and what you‚Äôre trying to do, and I‚Äôll give you step-by-step instructions.

mediaLibrary.title: MEDIA LIBRARY
mediaLibrary.content: Reference screenshots used for quick onboarding help.

liquidity.title: LIQUIDITY & LP LOCK (EXIT SAFETY)
liquidity.content:
üíß **LIQUIDITY (LP) = THE EXIT**

Liquidity is the pool you trade against. If it's weak or controlled, you can get TRAPPED.

‚úÖ **WHAT GOOD LIQUIDITY LOOKS LIKE:**
1. **Enough LP for your size** - Buy/sell without massive price impact
2. **Steady volume** - Real buys + sells, not one-sided
3. **No obvious control** - LP not easily removable

üîí **WHAT "LP LOCK" MEANS:**
LP Lock = liquidity tokens are time-locked so dev can't pull liquidity instantly.

‚ö†Ô∏è **LP LOCK REDUCES RUG RISK - IT DOES NOT PREVENT DUMPS!**

‚úÖ **PRO TIP:** Even with a lock, ALWAYS plan your exit. Locks don't stop whales from dumping.

lp_lock.title: LP LOCK (LOCKED LIQUIDITY) ‚Äî GREEN FLAG OR CAP?
lp_lock.content:
üîí **LP LOCK:**

An LP lock means liquidity tokens are locked so the team can‚Äôt instantly pull liquidity.

‚úÖ **GREEN FLAGS:**
‚Ä¢ Locked for weeks/months (not hours)
‚Ä¢ On-chain proof exists (not just a screenshot)
‚Ä¢ Lock amount matches what the coin claims

‚ö†Ô∏è **COMMON TRAPS:**
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúLocked‚Äù for 1‚Äì24 hours (basically nothing)
‚Ä¢ Partial lock (small % locked)
‚Ä¢ Split LP: they lock one small pool and keep the main pool movable
‚Ä¢ Fake proof links / edited screenshots

**BOTTOM LINE:** Verify on-chain or assume it‚Äôs NOT locked.

verify_locks.title: HOW TO VERIFY LP LOCKS (ON-CHAIN, NO TRUST)
verify_locks.content:
‚úÖ **VERIFYING A LOCK (THE RIGHT WAY):**

**Step 1 ‚Äî Find the main pair** (usually SOL/Token)
**Step 2 ‚Äî Check LP token holders** (who holds the LP tokens?)
**Step 3 ‚Äî Look for a locker contract** (LP tokens sitting inside a lock contract)
**Step 4 ‚Äî Confirm unlock time + amount**
**Step 5 ‚Äî Match the numbers** (does the locked amount match claims?)
**Step 6 ‚Äî Watch for split LP** (partial lock = risk)

**RULE:** If you can‚Äôt verify on-chain, treat it as NOT locked.

liquidity_removal.title: LIQUIDITY REMOVAL (THE CLASSIC RUG MECHANIC)
liquidity_removal.content:
üö® **LIQUIDITY REMOVAL = RUG**

If the team controls LP and removes it, the pool collapses and you get trapped.

**SIGNS BEFORE IT HITS:**
‚Ä¢ LP not locked / unverifiable
‚Ä¢ Weird wallet patterns + bundled vibes
‚Ä¢ Sudden hype push with weak fundamentals
‚Ä¢ Sells start filling worse and worse

**WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE LIVE:**
‚Ä¢ Instant death candle
‚Ä¢ Massive price impact
‚Ä¢ People can‚Äôt sell or sell for dust

**RULE:** If LP isn't verifiably locked, size down hard or skip.

rugpull.title: HOW TO SPOT A RUG PULL
rugpull.content:
üö® **RUG DETECTION CHECKLIST:**

1. **CHART PATTERN** - Healthy chart = heartbeat pattern (up, down, up). BAD chart = straight up then death drop.

2. **GLOBAL FEES vs MARKET CAP** - Must match! Example: 3 SOL fees = 20-40k MC. If they don't match = RUG.

3. **WALLET ANALYSIS:**
 ‚Ä¢ Check holder dates - All "1 month" old = BUNDLED WALLETS = RUG
 ‚Ä¢ All hold same amount of SOL = ONE PERSON = RUG
 ‚Ä¢ Look for fat clusters on bubble map

4. **BUBBLE MAP** - Should be dispersed. If it looks like DEATH STAR = RUG.

5. **LIQUIDITY** - Must have healthy liquidity. Zero liquidity = money gets LOCKED.

‚ö†Ô∏è ALWAYS CHECK: Fees, Wallets, Dates, Bubble Map, Liquidity

goodcoin.title: HOW TO SPOT A GOOD COIN
goodcoin.content:
‚úÖ **GOOD COIN CHECKLIST:**

1. **HEALTHY CHART** - Starts low, builds, continues up (not straight up/down)

2. **FEES MATCH MC** - Proper relationship between fees and market cap

3. **DECENT LIQUIDITY** - Must have good liquidity for entry/exit

4. **VOLUME** - Look for **200+ buys on 5-minute chart**. More buys = more interest.

5. **WALLET DISTRIBUTION:**
 ‚Ä¢ Different wallet ages (not all "1 month")
 ‚Ä¢ Different SOL holdings
 ‚Ä¢ Nobody holds >4% (3% okay, 5%+ is risk)

6. **BUBBLE MAP** - Dispersed, not clustered. No fat whales.

7. **NARRATIVE** - Good memeable story that spreads naturally

8. **CA POSTED** - Contract Address in community = green flag

9. **TEST SELL** - If possible, do a tiny test sell. If it‚Äôs weird/sluggish, be careful.

risk.title: RISK MANAGEMENT
risk.content:
üõ°Ô∏è **RISK RULES:**

1. **POSITION SIZE:** Risk only 1‚Äì5% per trade. Never go all-in.

2. **STOP LOSS:**
 ‚Ä¢ Once up 30‚Äì50%, move your stop above entry
 ‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt let a loss go past -15%
 ‚Ä¢ Cut red candles fast when you‚Äôre wrong

3. **TAKE PROFITS:**
 ‚Ä¢ At 2x: sell 50%
 ‚Ä¢ Every +30% after: sell 20%
 ‚Ä¢ Big green candles: sell 20%
 ‚Ä¢ At big levels (100k, 200k, 1M): sell 20%

‚ö° Goal: stay alive first. Profit second.

slippage.title: SLIPPAGE EXPLAINED
slippage.content:
üìä **SLIPPAGE:**

Slippage is the difference between expected price and your actual fill.

**TYPICAL SETTINGS:**
‚Ä¢ 10‚Äì15% for normal coins
‚Ä¢ 20‚Äì30% for fast movers
‚Ä¢ Too low = fails
‚Ä¢ Too high = bad fills

**TIP:** Start at 15% and adjust if it keeps failing.

stoploss.title: STOP LOSS (BASIC)
stoploss.content:
üßØ **STOP LOSS:**

A stop loss is your line in the sand so one coin doesn‚Äôt nuke your portfolio.

**BEGINNER RULES:**
‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt let it go past -15%
‚Ä¢ If you‚Äôre up 30‚Äì50%, move your stop above entry

Survive first. Then stack wins.

trailing_stop.title: TRAILING STOP LOSS (LET WINNERS RUN)
trailing_stop.content:
üìà **TRAILING STOP:**

A trailing stop moves up with price so you lock profit while giving the coin room to run.

**SIMPLE SETUP:**
‚Ä¢ Once up 30‚Äì50%: trail 3‚Äì10% above entry
‚Ä¢ If it‚Äôs super volatile: widen a bit so you don‚Äôt get wicked out

Goal: capture the move without marrying the coin.

take_profits.title: TAKE PROFITS (SCALE OUT LIKE A PRO)
take_profits.content:
üí∞ **TAKE PROFITS = GET PAID**

**DEFAULT PLAN:**
‚Ä¢ At 2x: sell 50%
‚Ä¢ Every +30% after: sell 20%
‚Ä¢ Big green candles: sell 20%

Meme coins reverse fast. If you don‚Äôt take profit, you become exit liquidity.

filters.title: AXIOM FILTER SETTINGS
filters.content:
üìä **NEW PAIRS FILTERS:**
‚Ä¢ Protocol: Pump.fun only
‚Ä¢ Dev holding: 5% max
‚Ä¢ Bundles: 40% max
‚Ä¢ Pro traders: 15%
‚Ä¢ MC: 5k min
‚Ä¢ Volume: 10k min

üéØ **FINAL STRETCH:**
‚Ä¢ Volume: 30k
‚Ä¢ MC: 20k
‚Ä¢ Top 10 holders: 40%
‚Ä¢ 200+ buys on 5min chart

These filters are designed to keep you safer.

workflow.title: APE ‚Üí SCAN ‚Üí WATCH WORKFLOW
workflow.content:
üéØ **TRADING STAGES:**

**APE** (Caller already bought)
‚Ä¢ Entry taken
‚Ä¢ Now monitoring

**SCAN** (Analyzing)
‚Ä¢ Not bought yet
‚Ä¢ Checking wallets, bubble map, chart

**WATCH** (Waiting)
‚Ä¢ Coin looks solid
‚Ä¢ Waiting for a dip / entry trigger

test_sell.title: TEST SELL (THE FASTEST RUG CHECK)
test_sell.content:
üß™ **TEST SELL:**

Before you size up, do a tiny sell to confirm exits work.

**WHY IT‚ÄôS POWERFUL:**
‚Ä¢ Some rugs let you buy but won‚Äôt let you sell
‚Ä¢ Thin liquidity shows up instantly through terrible fills

If it‚Äôs laggy, weird, or repeatedly fails: treat it as high risk.

ca.title: WHAT IS CA?
ca.content:
üìç **CA = CONTRACT ADDRESS**

The unique identifier for a token.

**HOW TO USE IT:**
1) Copy the CA
2) Paste into Axiom/DEX
3) You‚Äôll pull up the exact coin

Use CA to avoid fake copies.

settings.title: BUY/SELL SETTINGS
settings.content:
‚öôÔ∏è **TRADING SETTINGS:**

**SLIPPAGE:** 10‚Äì30% (typical 15%)

**FEES:** Always keep extra SOL for fees (selling can fail if you don‚Äôt).

**BUY:**
‚Ä¢ Set your max entry size
‚Ä¢ Use limits when possible

**SELL:**
‚Ä¢ Set a stop loss
‚Ä¢ Take profits on the way up
‚Ä¢ Scale out instead of full sending

bundles.title: BUNDLED WALLETS
bundles.content:
‚ö†Ô∏è **BUNDLES = ONE PERSON USING MANY WALLETS**

**HOW TO SPOT IT:**
‚Ä¢ Wallets are the same age
‚Ä¢ Wallets hold the same SOL amounts
‚Ä¢ Bubble map looks like a giant cluster (‚Äúdeath star‚Äù)
‚Ä¢ You see bundled trade markers

Bundled coins are often rug setups. Size down or skip.

bubblemap.title: BUBBLE MAP (WHALES VS CLUSTERS)
bubblemap.content:
ü´ß **BUBBLE MAP:**

‚úÖ Good look:
‚Ä¢ Dispersed holders
‚Ä¢ No giant connected cluster

üö® Bad look:
‚Ä¢ One massive connected cluster = one group controlling supply

Rule: If it looks like a death star, treat it like a rug setup.

volume.title: VOLUME ANALYSIS
volume.content:
üìä **VOLUME MATTERS:**

What to look for:
‚Ä¢ 200+ buys on the 5-min chart = strong
‚Ä¢ Volume matching MC = real interest
‚Ä¢ No volume = no attention

On Padre: use volume indicators for confirmation.
On Axiom: use volume filters to find active coins.

referrals.title: PLATFORM REFERRAL LINKS
referrals.content:
üîó **TRADER U PLATFORM LINKS:**

**AXIOM (Main):** Best for beginners, clean UI, mobile friendly
**NOVA (Advanced):** Fee cashback; better for experienced traders
**PADRE (Terminal):** Advanced terminal; faster execution

If you tell me what platform you‚Äôre using, I‚Äôll guide you through setup.

quotes: üíé "The best traders are the most disciplined." - Stay focused.
üéØ "Cut your losers early, let your winners run." - Old wisdom.
‚ö° "Patience beats FOMO every time." - Wait for your setup.
üî• "Survive first, profit second." - Risk management wins.
üí™ "Study your trades. Every loss is a lesson." - Keep learning.
tips: ‚úÖ ALWAYS check wallet dates before entering
‚úÖ Verify CA is posted in community
warnings: ‚ö†Ô∏è DON'T buy the top - wait for dip
